errors.name: Unauthorize

types.name: MatchCounter
docs: Used to get realtime list of opponents onchain.
Updated when players deployed their characters (+1) / matched (-1).

fields.name: band
docs: Elo rating band, 1200 for instance, will update index position 12's counter.
